message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $130. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not quite ready to meet you halfway just yet. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $135. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $128?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, and I appreciate your honesty. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer it to you for $132. It's a fair price, and I think you'll really get a lot out of this product. What do you think?
I'm getting close, but I still need to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $129?

I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I'm getting close to my minimum price. I can offer it to you for $131. This is the best I can do, and I think it's still a great deal for you. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable going above $128. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm sorry, but I've already compromised as much as I can. I'm not willing to go any lower than $130. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to consider other options.

I understand that you've compromised as much as you can, but I'm still not comfortable going above $128. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet at that price. If you're willing to meet me at $128, I'll buy the product from you. Otherwise, I'll have to consider other options.
